quote.html: Zen was a reaction. Just as Buddha came into the world and spoke against the fall of Vedanta, so Buddhism lost its essence and became ritual. Zen was a reaction to that. Zen was an attempt to get back to the purest teachings of the Buddha --enlightenment without strings.
